r.d: Class allows storing and retrieving all the strings on multilingual site in a database. The class connects to any database using PEAR::DB extension. The object should be created for every page. While creation all the strings connected with specific page and the strings connected with all the pages on the site are loaded into variable, so access to them is quite fast and does not overload database server connection.
r.n: - Fix incorrect assignment of table definitions - coding standards fixes - In admin functions: * allow custom table definitions * on create, check if a table exists before creating it * on delete, check if other translations share the same table before dropping it
